title: Album Page, "Mill at Dordricht", August 29, 1887
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on thick off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed:
recto, in graphite, at top left: 28; at top right (inscribed in a circle): 31
verso, in graphite, at top right: Dordricht / Aug 29 18-- (the last two digits are obscured by the fabric tape that binds the sheet into the album)
description: Horizontal sheet tipped into album vertically.  At left is a brown mill seen from the front, small lighter brown buildings are seen in the foreground.  There is a sketchy indication of trees and perhaps a green, marshy area adjacent to a body of water.  At right is another small mill and the indication of similar buildings at right.  The sky is thick with clouds breaking as though a storm was blowing in or had just ended.

tombstone.epitaph:
Album Page, "Mill at Dordricht", August 29, 1887.
August 29, 1887. Brush and watercolor, graphite on thick off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-112.
